history.content:
I failed a class last semester but got a B this semester after retaking it. I thought my GPA on CalCentral would have taken that into account, but it looks like it didn't. How long does it take for the correct GPA to appear? Or is this something I should make my adviser aware of? Thanks!

UPDATE: Looks like it‘s updated now.
history.subject: How long for GPA to reflect a repeated class grade?
